fontTheory.description: The typography system for this resume aims to combine modernity with readability, catering to a professional yet engaging tone.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen fonts offer a balance between elegance and clarity, ensuring easy readability across various screen sizes.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The hierarchy is established through a mix of sans-serif fonts for headings and body text, with variations in weight and style to denote importance.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Roboto and Open Sans work harmoniously for headings and body text, while Fira Code provides a clear monospace option for technical content.
